name: Comprehensive AI Research Reports: 2025 Developments & H1 2026 Trends
massive_request: I want you to create two different reports about AI. For each report, save the report as a PDF and then Gmail it to me. The first report about AI is: I want you to research the important developments in artificial intelligence during 2025. You'll need significant research to come and determine which research has been the most interesting or important,  For the second report, I want you to come up with your expectations for trends in artificial intelligence during the first half of 2026. Again, this should be grounded in research, which will have to be comp comprehensive.

phases.name: Phase 1: Report 1 - AI Developments in 2025 (LLMs & Foundation Models)

tasks.name: Research 2025 LLM and Foundation Model Breakthroughs
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive web research focusing on major LLM and foundation model releases, architectural innovations, benchmark achievements, and technical advances from 2025. Include model specifications, training methodologies, performance metrics, and comparative analyses.
success_criteria: Comprehensive corpus of 20-30 technical sources covering major 2025 LLM releases
Technical specifications and benchmark data for each major model
Architecture innovations and breakthrough capabilities documented
Comparative analysis data between models
tasks.use_case: Use WebSearch with year filter '2025' to search for: 'GPT-5 release', 'Claude 4 Anthropic', 'Gemini 3 Google', 'LLaMA 4 Meta', 'foundation model releases 2025', 'language model benchmarks 2025', 'model architecture innovations 2025', 'Mixture of Experts 2025', 'multimodal models 2025'. Gather technical papers, benchmark results, API documentation, and engineering blog posts. Focus on technical details: parameter counts, training data scales, context window improvements, reasoning capabilities, and architectural innovations.

tasks.name: Draft Section: LLM & Foundation Models Technical Analysis
tasks.description: Create a detailed technical analysis section for the 2025 AI Developments Report covering LLMs and foundation models. Include architecture diagrams, performance benchmarks, comparative analysis, and deep technical discussions of innovations.
success_criteria: Complete HTML section on LLMs/Foundation Models (8-12 pages)
Technical specifications tables and benchmark comparison charts
Architecture diagrams and technical explanations
Code examples and methodology discussions
Quantitative analysis with citations from research corpus
tasks.use_case: Generate comprehensive HTML section titled 'Large Language Models and Foundation Models in 2025' with subsections: 1) Major Model Releases and Specifications, 2) Architectural Innovations (MoE, attention mechanisms, training optimizations), 3) Benchmark Performance Analysis, 4) Capability Breakthroughs (reasoning, coding, math), 5) Technical Deep-dives of Key Models. Include tables comparing models, charts showing performance improvements, and technical discussion of training methodologies. Target 8-12 pages of technical content with code examples, architecture descriptions, and quantitative analysis.

phases.name: Phase 2: Report 1 - AI Developments in 2025 (Computer Vision & Multimodal AI)

tasks.name: Research 2025 Computer Vision and Multimodal AI Advances
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive web research on computer vision breakthroughs, multimodal AI systems, vision-language models, and related technical advances from 2025. Focus on architectural innovations, new datasets, benchmark achievements, and practical applications.
success_criteria: Comprehensive corpus of 15-25 technical sources on CV and multimodal AI
Documentation of major model releases and technical specifications
Benchmark performance data and improvements
Research papers on architectural innovations
tasks.use_case: Use WebSearch with year filter '2025' to search for: 'computer vision breakthroughs 2025', 'vision language models 2025', 'GPT-4V successor 2025', 'Gemini Ultra Vision 2025', 'diffusion model improvements 2025', 'video generation 2025', 'image recognition benchmarks 2025', 'CLIP improvements 2025', 'vision transformers 2025', 'multimodal AI 2025'. Gather research papers, benchmark results, technical blog posts, and performance analyses. Focus on: model architectures, training techniques, dataset innovations, and application breakthroughs.

tasks.name: Draft Section: Computer Vision & Multimodal AI Technical Analysis
tasks.description: Create a detailed technical analysis section for the 2025 AI Developments Report covering computer vision and multimodal AI systems. Include architecture discussions, performance benchmarks, and technical deep-dives.
success_criteria: Complete HTML section on CV/Multimodal AI (6-8 pages)
Benchmark comparison tables and performance charts
Technical architecture explanations with diagrams
Analysis of training techniques and methodologies
Quantitative results with proper citations
tasks.use_case: Generate comprehensive HTML section titled 'Computer Vision and Multimodal AI Advances in 2025' with subsections: 1) Vision-Language Model Breakthroughs, 2) Image Generation and Diffusion Models, 3) Video Generation and Understanding, 4) Object Detection and Recognition Advances, 5) Multimodal Reasoning Systems, 6) Technical Architecture Deep-dives. Include comparative benchmark tables, architecture diagrams, and technical discussions of training methodologies. Target 6-8 pages with quantitative analysis and code examples.

phases.name: Phase 3: Report 1 - AI Developments in 2025 (Robotics, Agents & Research)

tasks.name: Research 2025 Robotics, Embodied AI, and Autonomous Systems
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive web research on robotics advances, embodied AI, autonomous agents, and physical AI systems from 2025. Focus on technical implementations, real-world deployments, and research breakthroughs.
success_criteria: Comprehensive corpus of 15-20 sources on robotics and embodied AI
Technical documentation of major robotics AI systems
Performance metrics and benchmark results
Research papers on training methodologies and architectures
tasks.use_case: Use WebSearch with year filter '2025' to search for: 'robotics AI advances 2025', 'humanoid robots 2025', 'embodied AI 2025', 'autonomous agents 2025', 'robotics foundation models 2025', 'Tesla Optimus 2025', 'Figure AI 2025', 'robotics simulation 2025', 'manipulation improvements 2025', 'navigation AI 2025'. Gather technical papers, engineering blogs, benchmark results, and deployment case studies. Focus on: model architectures, training methods (simulation-to-real), hardware-software integration, and performance metrics.

tasks.name: Research 2025 AI Agents, Reasoning Systems, and Agentic Architectures
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive web research on autonomous AI agents, reasoning systems, agentic architectures, and multi-agent systems from 2025. Focus on technical implementations, framework releases, and research advances.
success_criteria: Comprehensive corpus of 15-25 sources on AI agents and reasoning
Documentation of major agent frameworks and architectures
Benchmark results on reasoning and planning tasks
Research papers on agentic AI methodologies
tasks.use_case: Use WebSearch with year filter '2025' to search for: 'AI agents 2025', 'autonomous agents framework 2025', 'reasoning models 2025', 'Chain of Thought improvements 2025', 'agentic AI 2025', 'multi-agent systems 2025', 'LangChain 2025', 'AutoGPT advances 2025', 'tool-using agents 2025', 'agent architectures 2025'. Gather research papers, framework documentation, benchmark results, and technical analyses. Focus on: reasoning architectures, tool integration, planning systems, and performance evaluations.

tasks.name: Research 2025 Academic Breakthroughs and Theoretical Advances
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive web research on academic breakthroughs, theoretical advances, and published research from 2025. Focus on papers from top conferences (NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR, CVPR) and journal publications.
success_criteria: Comprehensive corpus of 25-35 academic sources from 2025
Documentation of major research breakthroughs and award-winning papers
Technical summaries of theoretical contributions
Citation counts and impact metrics where available
tasks.use_case: Use WebSearch with year filter '2025' to search for: 'NeurIPS 2025 papers', 'ICML 2025 best papers', 'ICLR 2025 breakthroughs', 'AI research papers 2025', 'theoretical advances AI 2025', 'machine learning theory 2025', 'optimization advances 2025', 'generalization research 2025', 'interpretability 2025', 'safety research 2025'. Gather papers, citations, and technical analyses. Focus on: theoretical contributions, algorithmic innovations, empirical findings, and reproducibility. Include best paper awards and highly cited works.

tasks.name: Draft Section: Robotics, Agents & Academic Research Technical Analysis
tasks.description: Create detailed technical analysis sections for the 2025 AI Developments Report covering robotics, agents, and academic research. Include architecture discussions, performance benchmarks, and research summaries.
success_criteria: Complete HTML section on Robotics/Agents/Research (10-14 pages)
Technical architecture diagrams and explanations
Benchmark performance tables and comparisons
Research paper summaries with key contributions highlighted
Quantitative analysis with proper citations and references
tasks.use_case: Generate comprehensive HTML section titled 'Robotics, Agents, and Research Frontiers in 2025' with subsections: 1) Robotics and Embodied AI Advances, 2) Autonomous Agents and Agentic Architectures, 3) Reasoning Systems and Planning, 4) Multi-Agent Systems, 5) Academic Breakthroughs and Theoretical Advances, 6) Top Conference Papers and Contributions. Include technical architecture diagrams, benchmark tables, research paper summaries with key findings, and quantitative analysis. Target 10-14 pages covering all three domains with deep technical discussions.

phases.name: Phase 4: Report 1 - Compilation, PDF Generation & Email Delivery

tasks.name: Compile Complete 2025 AI Developments Report
tasks.description: Combine all researched sections into a comprehensive 30-50 page technical report on AI developments in 2025. Add executive summary, introduction, conclusion, and references. Ensure consistent formatting and professional presentation.
success_criteria: Complete compiled HTML report (30-50 pages)
Professional formatting with consistent styling
Executive summary and conclusion included
Comprehensive references section with all sources cited
Table of contents and proper document structure
tasks.use_case: Compile all previously generated HTML sections into a single comprehensive report titled 'AI Developments in 2025: A Technical Deep-Dive'. Add: 1) Executive Summary highlighting key developments, 2) Introduction setting context for 2025, 3) Table of Contents, 4) All technical sections (LLMs, CV/Multimodal, Robotics, Agents, Research), 5) Cross-cutting Themes Analysis, 6) Conclusion and Implications, 7) Comprehensive References section. Ensure professional HTML formatting with consistent styling, proper heading hierarchy, figure captions, table formatting, and inline citations. Target 30-50 pages total of technical content.

tasks.name: Convert Report 1 to PDF Format
tasks.description: Convert the compiled HTML report for 2025 AI Developments into a professionally formatted PDF document suitable for email delivery.
success_criteria: Successfully generated PDF file from HTML report
All content preserved with proper formatting
Readable fonts and proper page breaks
Figures, tables, and diagrams rendered correctly
File size reasonable for email attachment (<25MB)
tasks.use_case: Use the pdf skill to convert the HTML report 'AI Developments in 2025: A Technical Deep-Dive' to PDF format. Ensure proper page formatting, readable fonts (minimum 10pt body text), high-quality figures and tables, proper page breaks, and embedded hyperlinks in references. Verify that all technical content, diagrams, tables, and formatting are preserved in the PDF conversion. Output file should be named 'AI_Developments_2025_Technical_Report.pdf'.

tasks.name: Email Report 1 via Gmail
tasks.description: Send the completed 2025 AI Developments report PDF via Gmail to the user with appropriate subject line and message body.
success_criteria: Email successfully sent via Gmail
PDF file attached correctly
Subject line and body text professional and descriptive
User receives email without errors
tasks.use_case: Use the gmail tool to send email with: Subject 'AI Developments in 2025: Technical Deep-Dive Report', Body 'Please find attached the comprehensive technical report on major AI developments in 2025. This 30-50 page report covers LLMs, foundation models, computer vision, multimodal AI, robotics, autonomous agents, and academic research breakthroughs with detailed technical analysis, benchmarks, and architecture discussions. Report Sections: 1) Large Language Models & Foundation Models, 2) Computer Vision & Multimodal AI, 3) Robotics & Embodied AI, 4) Autonomous Agents & Agentic Architectures, 5) Academic Breakthroughs & Research. The report includes comprehensive references and technical deep-dives.' Attach the PDF file 'AI_Developments_2025_Technical_Report.pdf'.

phases.name: Phase 5: Report 2 - H1 2026 Trends (Expert Consensus & Industry Forecasts)

tasks.name: Research Expert Predictions and Industry Forecasts for H1 2026
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive web research gathering predictions, forecasts, and expectations from AI industry leaders, researchers, and experts for the first half of 2026. Focus on technical predictions, expected breakthroughs, and anticipated developments.
success_criteria: Comprehensive corpus of 20-30 expert prediction sources
Documentation of predictions from major AI lab leaders
Industry analyst reports and forecasts
Expert commentary with specific technical expectations
tasks.use_case: Use WebSearch with year filters '2025, 2026' to search for: 'AI predictions 2026', 'artificial intelligence trends first half 2026', 'AI forecast 2026', 'machine learning expectations 2026', 'OpenAI roadmap 2026', 'Google AI plans 2026', 'Anthropic 2026 plans', 'Meta AI 2026 roadmap', 'industry leader predictions AI 2026', 'researcher forecasts AI 2026'. Gather executive interviews, blog posts from AI leaders, analyst reports, conference talks (from late 2025), and expert commentary. Focus on: specific technical predictions, expected model releases, anticipated capabilities, and timeline estimates. Capture dissenting views and uncertainty ranges.

tasks.name: Research Announced Product Roadmaps and Scheduled Releases for H1 2026
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive web research on announced product roadmaps, scheduled releases, and planned launches from major AI companies for the first half of 2026. Focus on specific technical features, capabilities, and release timelines.
success_criteria: Comprehensive corpus of 15-25 roadmap and announcement sources
Documentation of announced releases for H1 2026
Technical specifications and planned features
Timeline estimates and development milestones
tasks.use_case: Use WebSearch with filters to search for: 'AI product roadmap 2026', 'GPT-5 release date 2026', 'Claude 4 release plans 2026', 'Gemini 3 roadmap 2026', 'LLaMA 4 release 2026', 'AI model releases H1 2026', 'OpenAI product plans 2026', 'Google AI launches 2026', 'Microsoft AI 2026 roadmap', 'feature announcements AI 2026'. Gather official announcements, press releases, product roadmap documents, conference presentations, and verified leak reports. Focus on: specific model architectures, expected capabilities, planned feature releases, API updates, infrastructure expansions, and technical specifications. Capture timeline estimates and development milestones.

tasks.name: Draft Section: Expert Consensus & Industry Roadmaps for H1 2026
tasks.description: Create detailed technical analysis section for the H1 2026 Trends Report covering expert predictions and industry roadmaps. Include comparative analysis, confidence levels, and technical expectations.
success_criteria: Complete HTML section on expert predictions and roadmaps (8-12 pages)
Comparative tables of predictions across experts and organizations
Confidence levels and uncertainty analysis
Timeline visualizations and milestone charts
Technical capability expectations with specificity
tasks.use_case: Generate comprehensive HTML section titled 'Expert Consensus and Industry Forecasts for H1 2026' with subsections: 1) Executive Summary of Predictions, 2) AI Lab Roadmaps and Announced Releases, 3) Expert Predictions by Technical Area (LLMs, CV, Robotics, Agents, Research), 4) Confidence Analysis and Uncertainty Ranges, 5) Comparative View Across Sources, 6) Key Technical Capabilities Expected. Include tables summarizing predictions by area, charts showing consensus levels, timeline visualizations, and comparative analysis of different expert views. Target 8-12 pages with quantitative assessment of prediction confidence and technical specificity.

phases.name: Phase 6: Report 2 - H1 2026 Trends (Research Directions & Extrapolation)

tasks.name: Research Published Research Papers and Preprints Indicating 2026 Directions
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive web research on recent research papers, preprints, and academic work from late 2025 that indicates research directions likely to mature in H1 2026. Focus on emerging techniques, preliminary results, and research trends.
success_criteria: Comprehensive corpus of 20-30 research papers and preprints from late 2025
Documentation of emerging techniques and early-stage research
'Future work' sections and research direction indicators
Promising preliminary results and experimental findings
tasks.use_case: Use WebSearch with year filter '2025' to search for: 'arXiv papers late 2025 AI', 'machine learning preprints November 2025', 'December 2025 AI research', 'emerging techniques AI 2025', 'research trends machine learning 2025', 'NeurIPS 2025 papers future directions', 'ICML 2025 upcoming research', 'unpublished research AI 2025', 'preprint servers AI 2025'. Gather recent preprints, conference papers, workshop discussions, and research blog posts. Focus on: early-stage research with promising results, techniques likely to mature, novel architectures, training method innovations, and theoretical advances. Include papers with 'future work' sections indicating 2026 directions.

tasks.name: Extrapolate Trends from 2025 Developments into H1 2026 Predictions
tasks.description: Analyze 2025 AI developments (from Report 1 research) and extrapolate trends to predict likely advances and breakthroughs for H1 2026. Focus on technical trajectories, scaling laws, capability evolution, and research directions.
success_criteria: Quantitative extrapolations from 2025 trends
Specific technical predictions with confidence intervals
Trajectory analysis across multiple technical dimensions
Identification of likely breakthrough areas based on momentum
tasks.use_case: Use the 2025 research corpus to analyze: 1) Scaling law trajectories (compute, data, parameters), 2) Architectural evolution patterns (attention mechanisms, MoE, training methods), 3) Capability improvement curves (reasoning, multimodal, tool use), 4) Research momentum indicators (citation patterns, publication trends), 5) Industry investment directions (hiring, infrastructure, acquisitions), 6) Technical bottlenecks and likely solutions. Extrapolate these trends with quantitative projections: expected parameter scales, compute requirements, benchmark improvements, and capability milestones. Generate technical predictions with confidence intervals based on trajectory analysis. Focus on testable, specific predictions for H1 2026.

tasks.name: Draft Section: Research Directions and Trend Extrapolation for H1 2026
tasks.description: Create detailed technical analysis section for the H1 2026 Trends Report covering research directions and extrapolated trends. Include quantitative projections, technical analysis, and confidence assessments.
success_criteria: Complete HTML section on research directions and extrapolation (10-14 pages)
Quantitative extrapolation charts and trajectory analysis
Confidence intervals and uncertainty assessments
Technical methodology documentation
Specific predictions grounded in 2025 data
tasks.use_case: Generate comprehensive HTML section titled 'Research Directions and Trend Extrapolation for H1 2026' with subsections: 1) Emerging Research from Late 2025, 2) Technical Trajectory Analysis, 3) Scaling Law Extrapolations, 4) Architecture Evolution Predictions, 5) Capability Improvement Forecasts, 6) Quantitative Projections with Confidence Intervals, 7) Bottleneck Analysis and Likely Solutions, 8) High-Confidence vs. Speculative Predictions. Include charts showing extrapolated trends, tables comparing 2025 baselines to 2026 projections, technical methodology for extrapolation, and uncertainty analysis. Target 10-14 pages with rigorous quantitative analysis and technical depth.

phases.name: Phase 7: Report 2 - Synthesis, PDF Generation & Email Delivery

tasks.name: Draft Section: Synthesis and Integrated Predictions for H1 2026
tasks.description: Create a synthesis section that integrates expert predictions, industry roadmaps, research directions, and trend extrapolation into a coherent set of technical predictions for H1 2026. Include cross-cutting themes and consensus views.
success_criteria: Complete HTML synthesis section (8-12 pages)
Integrated predictions across expert, industry, and research sources
High-confidence predictions with technical specificity
Scenario analysis and contingency planning
Consolidated tables and timelines
tasks.use_case: Generate comprehensive HTML section titled 'Synthesis: Integrated Technical Predictions for H1 2026' with subsections: 1) Executive Summary of Key Predictions, 2) High-Confidence Predictions (technical specifics), 3) Cross-Cutting Themes Across Domains, 4) Expected Breakthrough Areas with Rationale, 5) Infrastructure and Compute Predictions, 6) Safety and Alignment Developments Expected, 7) Integration Across Technical Areas, 8) Scenarios and Contingency Analysis. Include consolidated prediction tables, timeline visualizations, risk assessment, and identification of wildcard events. Target 8-12 pages with integrated analysis across all research streams.

tasks.name: Compile Complete H1 2026 AI Trends Report
tasks.description: Combine all researched sections into a comprehensive 30-50 page technical report on AI trends for H1 2026. Add executive summary, introduction, methodology explanation, conclusion, and references. Ensure consistent formatting and professional presentation.
success_criteria: Complete compiled HTML report (30-50 pages)
Professional formatting with consistent styling
Methodology section explaining prediction approach
Confidence framework for predictions
Comprehensive references section
tasks.use_case: Compile all previously generated HTML sections into a single comprehensive report titled 'AI Trends for H1 2026: A Technical Forecast'. Add: 1) Executive Summary highlighting key predictions, 2) Introduction and Scope (H1 2026 timeframe), 3) Methodology explaining expert consensus + roadmaps + research + extrapolation approach, 4) Table of Contents, 5) All technical sections (Expert Consensus, Research Directions, Extrapolation, Synthesis), 6) Prediction Confidence Framework, 7) Conclusion and Implications, 8) Comprehensive References section. Ensure professional HTML formatting with consistent styling, proper heading hierarchy, figure captions, table formatting, inline citations, and clear distinction between high-confidence and speculative predictions. Target 30-50 pages total.

tasks.name: Convert Report 2 to PDF Format
tasks.description: Convert the compiled HTML report for H1 2026 AI Trends into a professionally formatted PDF document suitable for email delivery.
success_criteria: Successfully generated PDF file from HTML report
All content preserved with proper formatting
Readable fonts and proper page breaks
Figures, tables, and diagrams rendered correctly
File size reasonable for email attachment (<25MB)
tasks.use_case: Use the pdf skill to convert the HTML report 'AI Trends for H1 2026: A Technical Forecast' to PDF format. Ensure proper page formatting, readable fonts (minimum 10pt body text), high-quality figures and tables, proper page breaks, and embedded hyperlinks in references. Verify that all technical content, diagrams, tables, and formatting are preserved in the PDF conversion. Output file should be named 'AI_Trends_H1_2026_Technical_Forecast.pdf'.

tasks.name: Email Report 2 via Gmail
tasks.description: Send the completed H1 2026 AI Trends report PDF via Gmail to the user with appropriate subject line and message body.
success_criteria: Email successfully sent via Gmail
PDF file attached correctly
Subject line and body text professional and descriptive
User receives email without errors
tasks.use_case: Use the gmail tool to send email with: Subject 'AI Trends for H1 2026: Technical Forecast Report', Body 'Please find attached the comprehensive technical forecast report on AI trends for the first half of 2026. This 30-50 page report combines expert predictions, industry roadmaps, research directions, and trend extrapolation to provide detailed technical forecasts. Report Sections: 1) Expert Consensus and Industry Forecasts, 2) Research Directions from Late 2025, 3) Trend Extrapolation from 2025 Developments, 4) Synthesis and Integrated Predictions. Methodology: Combines expert opinion analysis, announced product roadmaps, academic research paper analysis, and quantitative trend extrapolation with confidence intervals. Includes high-confidence predictions and speculative scenarios.' Attach the PDF file 'AI_Trends_H1_2026_Technical_Forecast.pdf'.
